text: "I Disappear" is a 2000 song by Metallica. It was taken from the Mission Impossible soundtrack and went to number 35 in the United Kingdom, number 76 in the United States, number 25 in Sweden, Scotland and Austria, number 2 in Finland, number 45 in France, number 6 in Greece, number 31 in Ireland, number 36 in the Netherlands and number 8 in Norway and Italy. ==Track listing== The CD maxi single of I Disappear has only two tracks, the title song and its instrumental version. # "I Disappear" (James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich)4:26 # "I Disappear" (Instrumental)4:26 ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Metallica songs Category:Mission: Impossible
title: I Disappear
